bibl.title: Excavating the Churches of Tebtunis.
bibl.note: Paper presented in the First Annual Symposium of Coptic Studies held on 29 March 2008 at the University of Toronto. - Preliminary overview of the churches of Tebtynis, especially a painted one cleared in 1933, for which recently discovered unlabeled photos in Padua and a notebook at Trent University in Canada will facilitate a detailed report.

bibl.title: Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes

bibl.seg: Begg Ian, Excavating the Churches of Tebtunis.
Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes 1 (2010) pp. 69-73.

Paper presented in the First Annual Symposium of Coptic Studies held on 29 March 2008 at the University of Toronto. - Preliminary overview of the churches of Tebtynis, especially a painted one cleared in 1933, for which recently discovered unlabeled photos in Padua and a notebook at Trent University in Canada will facilitate a detailed report.
